snippet: The former N.F.L. running back Craig James is running for the Senate, but he is starting from way behind the other candidates.
lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. running back Craig James is running for the Senate, but he is starting from way behind the other candidates.

headline.seo: Craig James Is Running for the Senate from Texas, but From Behind
headline.main: Craig James Is Running, but He Has a Lot of Catching Up to Do
headline.print_headline: Craig James Is Running, but He Has a Lot of Catching Up to Do
